instructions: Tap the Albums tab, then tap the Add button . Choose to create a New Album or New Shared Album. Name the album, then tap Save. Choose the photos you want to add, then tap Done.

Tap the Albums tab, then tap See All. Tap Edit, then do any of the following: Rename: Tap the album name, then enter a new name. Rearrange: Touch and hold the album s thumbnail, then drag to a new location. Delete: Tap the Delete button . Tap Done.

Tap the Albums tab, then tap Recently Deleted (at the bottom of the screen). Tap Select, then select the photos and videos you want to recover or delete. Tap Recover, or tap Delete to permanently delete the photo.
